content: this cute karl johan penny bun mushroom ornament is a great way to use up dk weight scrap yarn the weight of this ornament is approx 7g and 9cm long knit in the round using magic loop or double pointed needles it is a quick project ideal for gifts decorating a christmas tree or perhaps even making a garland or a nature themed baby mobile this was originally an improvised pattern i made for my brother-in-law and it was too cute not to share due to that it is quick and dirty a very simply written pattern so if you have any questions please message me enjoy
